data.eml:eml: Eremonidiopsis aggregata, gen. n., sp. n. from Cuba, the third West Indian Dioptinae (Lepidoptera, Notodontidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Aguila, Rayner Nunez (2013): Eremonidiopsis aggregata, gen. n., sp. n. from Cuba, the third West Indian Dioptinae (Lepidoptera, Notodontidae). ZooKeys 333: 77-91, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.333.5483, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.333.5483
